Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.config.handle

Class BaseConfigurationHandle<C extends org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.config.handle.BaseConfigurationHandle<C>
Type Parameters:
C - The configuration type.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfigurationSectionHandle, FileConfigurationHandle
public abstract class BaseConfigurationHandle<C extends org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection> extends Object
Generic configuration handle for all ConfigurationSection types.
